nodes.text: Shadow Tech Armor was a heavily modified field version of the Phase II armor worn by clone troopers of the Grand Army of the Republic. They were augmented with the use of advanced Umbaran technology and marked these clones as elite veterans of the Battle of Umbara.

Shadow Tech Armor appeared in the game Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures in the Battle of Umbara combat zone. Small holograms hidden in the zone can be collected by the players. Completing a collection of these holograms rewards players with a piece of wearable Shadow Tech armor.
